text: Bad experience. Took my 2nd sinopharm dose and was told i can take less than 3 weeks. After that MOH didn't update my vaccination status as it is less than 3 weeks. Make an appeal and told them the clinic allows less than 3 weeks as they need to convert back to cosmetic clinic. Waste alot of my time and they are not responsible for what they did. Did a complaint to MOH on them. VEry disappointed with the clinic and their staff. Never apologise till now.

Made an appointment with one of the staff on Sunday 9am. She said it was open on that day so I went ahead to book a slot for my 3rd covid jab. Went down for it and realized that they were not open. I texted the staff and she said they will be opening so gave them awhile. I waited for 30mins and still no one showed up. Very disappointed in the clinic. Never going there again.
Service sucks big time, doctor was not in but did not inform patient in advance and rushed down for nothing.
This clinic is very bad service . The staff there is not doing their work.ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡ðŸ˜¡
